title: Twelve Nights
description: When a last minute job opportunity forces Dale’s wife to miss out on their planned Hawaiian vacation with Kent and Cherise, the trio thinks the next 12 nights will be a bust. Dale devises a plan to spice up their tropical nights; but before he can put his plan into play Dale meets sultry spring breaker Sam on the beach and she quickly becomes the highlight of their vacation. Sam is more than any of them could have dreamed of… an ideal fantasy for each of them… Until they awake in their suite to find blood, and Sam is missing. The trio suspect foul play; but who? Why? Sam had ignited passions, awakened uncharted sexual desires. Could one of them have caused her harm? Could she have staged her disappearance? They strain the limits of their friendship to find out what has become of their mysterious new lover, and what will become of them.
author: K. Presence
